Text: The aspect ratio of this vid is off. It is too tall for its' width (or too skinny for its' height - take your pick) I was unable to change the aspect ratio using the normal media players and it would not play in VLC until I converted it to AVI format. Then I used VLC to change the aspect ration to 221:100 and it looked normal. Otherwise vid and sound were fine - funny movie, thanks!

The detective Inspector Lee, a detective from Hong Kong and the 
detective James Carter FBI, have to catch the criminals and save an 
11year-old Chinese girl of the Chinese consul named Soo Yung.For more 
information go to http://www.wing-chun.ws/Rush%20Hour.html
